dialogueTree.title: Electrochemistry: "That sugary black rum stain on the..."
dialogueTree.text: That sugary black rum stain on the counter makes you teary-eyed with joy. It's almost touching how syrupy and sticky it is. How long have you been up already?

links.title: You: "An hour?"
links.text: An hour?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Sweet lord, a whole hour! And you h..."
links.text: Sweet lord, a whole hour! And you haven't thought about rum and lemonade in all that time? You've truly extinguished all trace of yourself.

links.title: You: "I've been secretly thinking about i..."
links.text: I've been secretly thinking about it all this time!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "There he is, the old boy the devil!..."
links.text: There he is, the old boy the devil! You rascal, you! Lets celebrate right now by licking that stain off the counter. Do it, it'll be *wild*!

links.title: You: "Lick it."
links.text: Lick it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Calmly the lieutenant looks out of..."
links.text: Calmly the lieutenant looks out of the window, then to you licking the tasty rum stain off the counter, then out of the window again.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you doing?" he asks witho..."
links.text: "What are you doing?" he asks without turning his eyes from the street outside.

links.title: You: ""Investigating.""
links.text: "Investigating."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should move.""
links.text: "We should move."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You could definitely go for some mo..."
links.text: You could definitely go for some more, the titillating scent of alcohol in your nostrils was beautiful.

links.title: You: ""I'm an alcoholic. I needed to get..."
links.text: "I'm an alcoholic. I needed to get my hit."

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry. I drifted off into my o..."
links.text: "I'm sorry. I drifted off into my own thoughts and now this happened."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You press your tongue against the c..."
links.text: You press your tongue against the counter. The stain is crusted at first, but after a couple of licks it starts to melt like a snowflake. If snowflakes were made of spiced black rum. Maybe it's your imagination but there's already some lemonade in it too. And some human hairs.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It would go well with those cigaret..."
links.text: It would go well with those cigarettes. That's a *great* combination.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You could definitely go for some mo..."
links.text: You could definitely go for some more. The titillating scent of alcohol in your nostrils was beautiful.

links.title: You: "Don't lick it."
links.text: Don't lick it.

links.title: You: "Lick it, but only a little."
links.text: Lick it, but only a little.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Calmly the lieutenant looks out of..."
links.text: Calmly the lieutenant looks out of the window, then to you licking the tasty rum stain off the counter -- but only a *little* -- then out of the window again.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you doing?" he asks witho..."
links.text: "What are you doing?" he asks without turning his eyes from the street outside.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You lick it but only a little. Only..."
links.text: You lick it but only a little. Only with the tip of your tongue because you're a pleasure delayer. After two or three licks the crust begins to melt and a sweetness breaks loose. The sharp titillating scent of alcohol rises to your nostrils. It's dizzying.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You could definitely go for some mo..."
links.text: You could definitely go for some more.

links.title: You: "Actually, *should* I be thinking ab..."
links.text: Actually, *should* I be thinking about this? Looks like drinking hasn't turned out too well for me.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "MAYBE YOU HAVEN'T TURNED OUT WELL F..."
links.text: MAYBE YOU HAVEN'T TURNED OUT WELL FOR YOUR DRINKING?! Have you thought about that?! Get a god damn rum and lemonade into yourself, boy! Or better yet -- lick that stain off the counter!

links.title: You: "Now that you mention it, I do *need..."
links.text: Now that you mention it, I do *need* a rum and lemonade. Isn't that a bar over there?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Forget about the bar... Or don't fo..."
links.text: Forget about the bar... Or don't forget about it, you should totally try to get a drink there too. But FIRST you should lick that stain off the counter! Yeah, man! Lets get WILD! Lick it!

links.title: You: "Now that you mention it, I do *need..."
links.text: Now that you mention it, I do *need* a rum and lemonade. I'd love for Garte to serve me up a *beverage*.

links.title: You: "Maybe later."
links.text: Maybe later.

links.title: Electrochemistry: ""Maybe later"? What is this, casual..."
links.text: "Maybe later"? What is this, casual Friday? What's with the lackadaisical lax-man attitude? You used to be *passionate* about getting your drink on. Show me you're still young. Show me you have the FIRE in you! Lick that stain off the counter RIGHT NOW.

links.title: You: "I'll lick it later."
links.text: I'll lick it later.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "RIGHT NOW MOTHERFUCKER!"
links.text: RIGHT NOW MOTHERFUCKER!

links.title: You: "I don't want to lick it."
links.text: I don't want to lick it.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "What happened, man? You used to be..."
links.text: What happened, man? You used to be *cool*. Go get your boring normal person drink then...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Get your drink on and your act toge..."
links.text: Get your drink on and your act together.

links.title: You: "Two hours?"
links.text: Two hours?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "An hour would have been bad -- two..."
links.text: An hour would have been bad -- two hours is *mystical*. You have truly wiped out all trace of yourself if you haven't thought about rum and lemonade yet.

links.title: You: "Pretty long. It's drink o'clock."
links.text: Pretty long. It's drink o'clock.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Atta boy! It's coming back to him!..."
links.text: Atta boy! It's coming back to him! You had your mesolimbic reward pathway worried there. Not thinking about drinking all that time... It was like you weren't *yourself*.

links.title: You: "Not now."
links.text: Not now.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Oh *excuse me*, do you have somethi..."
links.text: Oh *excuse me*, do you have something better to do than lust for sweet syrupy rum and lemonade? With a twist of lemon? Maybe lime? Maybe who cares, just rum?

links.title: Volition: "Yes, you do have something better t..."
links.text: Yes, you do have something better to do. Stop drooling over that stupid rum stain and go. Before it's too late.

links.title: You: "Maybe I should... lick it before I..."
links.text: Maybe I should... lick it before I go?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yeah man, yeah! Your mesolimbic rew..."
links.text: Yeah man, yeah! Your mesolimbic reward pathway is going wild at the thought. Lick it, lick it, lick it your receptors chant.

links.title: You: "[Finish thought.]"
links.text: [Finish thought.]
